#Problem 1
## Create a data frame
```{r #Problem 1}
set.seed(666)
p1_df = tibble(
  z = runif(10, min = 0, max = 5),
  vec_logical = z > 2,
  vec_char = c("a", "b", "c", "d","e","f","g","h","i","j"),
  vec_factor = factor(c("male", "male", "female", "female","male", "male", "female", "female", "female", "female"))
)
p1_df
mean(p1_df$z)
mean(p1_df$vec_logical)
mean(p1_df$vec_char)
mean(p1_df$vec_factor)
```
